verses.name: Genesis 32:25
verses.text: And when he saw that he prevailed not against him, he touched the hollow of his thigh; and the hollow of Jacob’s thigh was out of joint, as he wrestled with him.

verses.name: Genesis 32:26
verses.text: And he said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. And he said, I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.

verses.name: Genesis 32:27
verses.text: And he said unto him, What is thy name? And he said, Jacob.

verses.name: Genesis 32:28
verses.text: And he said, Thy name shall be called no more Jacob, but Israel: for as a prince hast thou power with God and with men, and hast prevailed.
